text: Can you get 2 pieces of bread for me?
I'll be waiting for you at the park
Time to go to the shop to buy some bread then.
Hello, I'm a little baker selling bread and drinks!
Ah, so do you have my bread?
So, do you want some bread?
You explain that helper cat needs bread to feed his poor family
I guess I can sell you bread for 4 coins
You try to pity trip the shopkeeper but he won't bulge
The price is 5 coins, nothing less, nothing more.
I've got enough bread now, I'm going to go to the park.
Hmm, I still need to buy more bread for helper cat.
It's full of ocult rituals. I'm not sure what they are, but I'm sure they are useful.
